# scatteR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

scatteR generates scatterplots based on [scagnostic](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/scagnostics/index.html) measurements.

## Installation

You can install the released version of scatteR from [Github](https://github.com/janithwanni/scatteR) with:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("janithwanni/scatteR")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(scatteR)
## basic example code
df <- scatteR(measurements = c("Montonic" = 0.9),n_points = 20,init_points = 5)
plot(df$x,df$y)
```
